metadata.feature_description: Analytics for idea submissions showing voting patterns and idea popularity

steps.action: Navigate to PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics
steps.expected: Community Analytics panel opens with tabs for different modules including Ideas
steps.actual: Community Analytics panel fails to load - content area remains empty due to JavaScript error: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function at social-dashboard-combined-instance.js:1025

issues: CRITICAL BUG: Community Analytics panel fails to initialize due to missing utility.serializeCustomDate function in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js at line 1025. This blocks access to ALL Community Analytics features including Ideas Module Analytics.

steps.action: Attempted to access Ideas tab in Community Analytics
steps.expected: Ideas tab displays submission rate metrics
steps.actual: Cannot access Ideas tab - Community Analytics panel fails to load due to JavaScript initialization error

issues: Blocked by Community Analytics initialization failure - utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

steps.expected: Ideas tab displays voting pattern analytics
steps.actual: Cannot access Ideas tab - Community Analytics panel fails to load due to JavaScript initialization error

issues: Blocked by Community Analytics initialization failure - utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

steps.actual: Cannot access Ideas tab - Community Analytics panel fails to load due to JavaScript initialization error

issues: Blocked by Community Analytics initialization failure - utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

steps.action: Attempted to access Ideas tab to analyze idea trends
steps.expected: Ideas tab displays trend analysis over time
steps.actual: Cannot access Ideas tab - Community Analytics panel fails to load due to JavaScript initialization error

issues: Blocked by Community Analytics initialization failure - utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

observations: CRITICAL BUG FOUND: The Community Analytics panel fails to initialize due to a JavaScript error at line 1025 in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js. The code calls utility.serializeCustomDate() but this function does not exist on the utility object.
The error message from browser console: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function at dashboardClass.init (social-dashboard-combined-instance.js:1025:39)
This bug affects ALL Community Analytics features, not just Ideas Module Analytics. The entire Community Analytics panel cannot be accessed.
The Dashboard menu correctly shows 'Community Analytics' as a submenu item, but clicking it results in an empty panel with no content due to the JavaScript initialization failure.

Code review confirms the API endpoints exist in CommunityAnalyticsController.cs (GetModuleDashboardInfo, GetModulePopularContent, etc.) but they cannot be reached due to the frontend initialization failure.
